147.movie_plot: A group of male friends become obsessed with five mysterious sisters who are sheltered by their strict, religious parents in suburban Detroit in the mid-1970s.

146.movie_plot: Comedy-drama about a widowed U.S. President and a lobbyist who fall in love. It's all above-board, but "politics is perception", and sparks fly anyway.

172.movie_plot: Junior's back in his first adventure since his last! Junior and Ben move to Mortville which seems like the perfect town to live in. The Healys have a nice new house--and Junior get's a cool...

139.movie_plot: In 2002, two rival Olympic ice skaters were stripped of their gold medals and permanently banned from men's single competition. Presently, however, they've found a loophole that will allow them to qualify as a pairs team.

171.movie_plot: This comedy is about the residents of a small town who get over-excited when their hockey team gets chosen to host a televised event

173.movie_plot: A compilation of found footage featuring music, interviews, and stories of The Beatles' 250 concerts from 1963 to 1966.

135.movie_plot: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

150.movie_plot: A Chicago teenager is looking for fun at home while his parents are away, but the situation quickly gets out of hand.

137.movie_plot: A scheming widow and her manipulative ex-lover make a bet regarding the corruption of a recently married woman.

141.movie_plot: Three company workers who hate their jobs decide to rebel against their greedy boss.

152.movie_plot: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

160.movie_plot: At the close of WWII, a young nurse tends to a badly-burned plane crash victim. His past is shown in flashbacks, revealing an involvement in a fateful love affair.

144.movie_plot: An abortion clinic worker with a special heritage is called upon to save the existence of humanity from being negated by two renegade angels trying to exploit a loop-hole and reenter Heaven.

148.movie_plot: A movie special effects man is hired to fake a real-life mob killing for a witness protection plan, but finds his own life in danger.

169.movie_plot: Two escaped convicts arrive in the town of Happy, Texas, where they are mistaken for a gay couple who is to host the town's Little Miss Fresh Squeezed beauty pageant. Enjoying the celebrity...

155.movie_plot: A group of teenagers look to save their town from an invasion of North Korean soldiers.

149.movie_plot: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

161.movie_plot: After a tragedy, John Ingram and his wife Rae are spending some time isolated at sea, when they come across a stranger who has abandoned a sinking ship.

154.movie_plot: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

132.movie_plot: A poor girl must choose between the affections of her doting childhood sweetheart and a rich but sensitive playboy.

156.movie_plot: A young boy is just short of a monster. He is adopted by a loving man and his wacky wife. The laughs keep coming as the boy pushes them to the limits.

151.movie_plot: A New York girl sets her father up with a beautiful woman in a troubled marriage while her stepsister gets engaged.

138.movie_plot: A British soldier kidnapped by IRA terrorists soon befriends one of his captors, who then becomes drawn into the soldier's world.

164.movie_plot: An ambitious television soap actress connives with her producer to scuttle the career of the show's long-time star, but nothing works as they plan.

134.movie_plot: Kermit, Gonzo and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

136.movie_plot: Earth is invaded by Martians with unbeatable weapons and a cruel sense of humor.

143.movie_plot: The life of a simple bookshop owner changes when he meets the most famous film star in the world.

130.movie_plot: In a dystopic and crime-ridden Detroit, a terminally wounded cop returns to the force as a powerful cyborg haunted by submerged memories.

117.movie_plot: Kermit and his newfound friends trek across America to find success in Hollywood, but a frog legs merchant is after Kermit.

118.movie_plot: A married man's one-night stand comes back to haunt him when that lover begins to stalk him and his family.

104.movie_plot: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

41.movie_plot: Two British track athletes, one a determined Jew, and the other a devout Christian, compete in the 1924 Olympics.

79.movie_plot: A veteran British barrister must defend his client in a murder trial that has surprise after surprise.

2.movie_plot: In the 1940s, a young boy named Ralphie attempts to convince his parents, his teacher, and Santa that a Red Ryder B.B. gun really is the perfect Christmas gift.

125.movie_plot: True story of Heinrich Harrer, an Austrian mountain climber who became friends with the Dalai Lama at the time of China's takeover of Tibet.

49.movie_plot: When a childless couple of an ex-con and an ex-cop decide to help themselves to one of another family's quintuplets, their lives become more complicated than they anticipated.

18.movie_plot: Federal Agent Eliot Ness sets out to stop Al Capone; because of rampant corruption, he assembles a small, hand-picked team.

22.movie_plot: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

34.movie_plot: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.

122.movie_plot: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.

28.movie_plot: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.

44.movie_plot: The aliens are coming and their goal is to invade and destroy Earth. Fighting superior technology, mankind's best weapon is the will to survive.

55.movie_plot: John McClane, officer of the NYPD, tries to save his wife Holly Gennaro and several others that were taken hostage by German terrorist Hans Gruber during a Christmas party at the Nakatomi Plaza in Los Angeles.

114.movie_plot: Four teenage boys enter a pact to lose their virginity by prom night.

113.movie_plot: In a future where the polar ice-caps have melted and Earth is almost entirely submerged, a mutated mariner fights starvation and outlaw "smokers," and reluctantly helps a woman and a young girl try to find dry land.

124.movie_plot: A newspaper reporter enrolls in high school as part of research for a story.

61.movie_plot: A mute woman is sent to 1850s New Zealand along with her young daughter and prized piano for an arranged marriage to a wealthy landowner, but is soon lusted after by a local worker on the plantation.

72.movie_plot: Over the course of five social occasions, a committed bachelor must consider the notion that he may have discovered love.

78.movie_plot: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saves him from drowning as a boy and falls in love not knowing who/what she is.

110.movie_plot: Brian is born on the original Christmas, in the stable next door. He spends his life being mistaken for a messiah.

115.movie_plot: Three film students vanish after traveling into a Maryland forest to film a documentary on the local Blair Witch legend, leaving only their footage behind.

39.movie_plot: Ambitious but troubled movie director, Edward D. Wood Jr, tries his best to fulfill his dream, despite his lack of support.

105.movie_plot: When a group of trespassing seniors swim in a pool containing alien cocoons, they find themselves energized with youthful vigour.

36.movie_plot: Archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.

101.movie_name: Star Trek: The Wrath of Khan (1982)
101.movie_plot: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

1.movie_plot: While home sick in bed, a young boy's grandfather reads him a story called The Princess Bride.

83.movie_plot: A New York City doctor, who is married to an art curator, pushes himself on a harrowing and dangerous night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife admits that she once almost cheated on him.

4.movie_plot: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

20.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode VI - Return of the Jedi (1983)

87.movie_name: Life Is Beautiful (La Vita è bella) (1997)
87.movie_plot: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses a perfect mixture of will, humor and imagination to protect his son from the dangers around their camp.

88.movie_plot: Male nurse Greg Focker meets his girlfriend's parents before proposing, but her suspicious father is every date's worst nightmare.

68.movie_plot: A high school teacher's personal life becomes complicated as he works with students during the school elections, particularly with an obsessive overachiever determined to become student body president.

37.movie_plot: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

121.movie_plot: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

31.movie_plot: Three trappers protect a British Colonel's daughters in the midst of the French and Indian War.

98.movie_name: All Quiet on the Western Front (1930)
98.movie_plot: A young soldier faces profound disillusionment in the soul-destroying horror of World War I.

93.movie_plot: Lovers' lives are complicated by city law, feuding faerie royalty, and... love.

33.movie_plot: Adaptation of James Jones' autobiographical 1962 novel, focusing on the conflict at Guadalcanal during the second World War.

19.movie_name: Star Wars: Episode I - The Phantom Menace (1999)
19.movie_plot: Two Jedi Knights escape a hostile blockade to find allies and come across a young boy who may bring balance to the Force, but the long dormant Sith resurface to claim their old glory.

5.movie_plot: A man afraid to fly must ensure that a plane lands safely after the pilots become sick.

51.movie_plot: An exclusive golf course has to deal with a brash new member and a destructive dancing gopher.

128.movie_plot: An android endeavors to become human as he gradually acquires emotions.

60.movie_name: Bridge on the River Kwai, The (1957)

108.movie_plot: The life and career of a legendary comedian, Andy Kaufman.

24.movie_plot: A maverick dancer risks his career by performing an unusual routine and sets out to succeed with a new partner.

59.movie_plot: A rich high school student tries to boost a new pupil's popularity, but reckons without affairs of the heart getting in the way.

94.movie_plot: A small-town boy obsessed with the Italian cycling team vies for the affections of a college girl.

65.movie_plot: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

58.movie_plot: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her ten year old son, John Connor, from a more advanced cyborg.

89.movie_plot: An epic mosaic of interrelated characters in search of love, forgiveness, and meaning in the San Fernando Valley.

86.movie_plot: Rob, a record store owner and compulsive list maker, recounts his top five breakups, including the one in progress.

15.movie_plot: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.

126.movie_plot: Christy Brown, born with cerebral palsy, learns to paint and write with his only controllable limb - his left foot.

17.movie_plot: A U.S. Army officer, despondent about a deadly mistake he made, investigates a female chopper commander's worthiness for the Medal of Honor.

116.movie_plot: In 1965, an unorthodox and irreverent DJ named Adrian Cronauer begins to shake up things when he is assigned to the U.S. Armed Services radio station in Vietnam.

57.movie_plot: A team of commandos on a mission in a Central American jungle find themselves hunted by an extraterrestrial warrior.

109.movie_plot: Jake Blues, just out from prison, puts together his old band to save the Catholic home where he and brother Elwood were raised.

107.movie_plot: A veteran policeman, Murtaugh, is partnered with a younger, suicidal officer, Riggs. They both have one thing in common: hating working in pairs. Now they must learn to work with one another to stop a gang of drug smugglers.
